entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:34 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: E 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating near midnight. Wind east 30 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 early in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
